name: sonarr
description: Sonarr is a self-hosted TV series manager that automatically downloads, renames, and organizes episodes for Usenet and torrent users, integrating with indexers and media servers.

features.title: Automated Downloads
features.description: Monitors RSS feeds and automatically downloads new episodes

features.title: Quality Profiles
features.description: Defines preferred quality settings and upgrade rules for episodes

features.title: Calendar View
features.description: Displays upcoming and recently aired episodes in calendar format

features.title: Usenet And Torrent
features.description: Integrates with download clients like SABnzbd, NZBGet, and qBittorrent

features.title: File Renaming
features.description: Automatically renames downloaded files with customizable naming schemes

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Identifies and searches for missing episodes in your collection
